publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1367 Chris Ballance: Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative-That the Parliament welcomes the joint initiative by ScotRail and FirstBus to provide a connecting bus and rail service with through-ticketing between Haddington and Edinburgh; further welcomes the initial special offer of free travel for a trial period between 24 May and 20 June 2004, and recommends that other bus companies enter into similar arrangements with ScotRail and the new rail franchise holder.

S2M-1367 Chris Ballance: Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative-That the Parliament welcomes the joint initiative by ScotRail and FirstBus to provide a connecting bus and rail service with through-ticketing between Haddington and Edinburgh; further welcomes the initial special offer of free travel for a trial period between 24 May and 20 June 2004, and recommends that other bus companies enter into similar arrangements with ScotRail and the new rail franchise holder. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1367 Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative (lodged on 26 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Frances Curran*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-1367 Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative (lodged on 26 May 2004) Iain Smith*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1367 Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative (lodged on 26 May 2004) Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1367 Joint ScotRail and FirstBus Initiative (lodged on 26 May 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
